instructions.title: Making a Contribution
instructions.desc: Thank you for thinking to contribute to NEAR in Minutes ðŸš€ Checkout this guide to get started.

setup.title: Step 1. Setup your system
setup.stepOne: Divide you screen according to topic of to tutorial and place your documents page, terminal, code editor and tools on your screen
setup.stepTwo: Show your sytem info, tool versions and date on the divided terminal pane
setup.stepthree: Open loom app and be sure your recording settings are set

video.title: Step 2. Create your video
video.stepTwo: Click on the 'Get Loom for Free' and sign up
video.stepThree: Click on the avatar at top right corner of the side and choose your download method.
video.stepFour: When you are ready to record, click on `Start Recording`

issues.subTitle: Step 3. Submit your video
issues.stepOne: Go to the issues section in
issues.stepTwo: Click on a  New issue and choose the type of content you would like to contribute.
issues.stepThree: Choose how you want to contribute and fill in the information accordingly.
issues.seeExample: If you like to see an example of a submitted issue
issues.learnMore: If you want to get more information on how to make a good video
issues.types: Currently we have three types of contribution:
issues.newContentDesc: if you have a video in mind you would like to create and add to the collection of videos.
issues.newTopicDesc: if you would like to translate the content to another language. Currently we support Turkish and Hindi.
issues.translateDesc: if you have a topic in mind and you would like to suggest so someone else can make a tutorial about it.
